greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, then after the first differences of A003434.
comment: Also, from a(2) onward the first differences of A049108, and from a(3) onward the first differences of A032358.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A003434(n) = for(k=0, n, n>1 || return(k); n=eulerphi(n));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 18 2020
